long_description: The Vans Revere Snowboard boots feature custom-moldable liners and Vans Hybrid Boa lacing for a dialed fit that's perfect for your all-mountain shred sessions. Vans Hybrid Boa lacing offers the best of both worlds: it combines traditional laces with a Boa closure that focuses primarily on the critical instep area of the boots. Custom Boa dials celebrate the partnership between Vans and Boa, and feature a diamond texture and sidestripe detailing. Each boot has two RECCO(R) reflectors that enhance radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors for quicker location in an avalanche. QuadFit X thermal liners feature asymmetric X-Cage inserts that lock your heels in place; low-volume soles help you feel connected to the board. Liners can be custom-molded at your local REI store for a personalized fit. Cuffs flex easily for enhanced board control when carving; wrap-around design offers a secure closure around your ankles and calves. Dual instep flex zones allow a forgiving medial flex and natural articulation while maintaining lateral support. Molded EVA footbeds feature integrated arch support and dual-density metatarsal and heel impact-relief pads. Lightweight, cushioned rubber outsoles offer maximum traction in wet and slippery conditions; skate-style silhouette offers a low-profile fit.
